desc: The pelt of a great bird called the "Beryl Bird."

dictionary.lore: The pelt of a great bird called the "Beryl Bird. "With a degeneration in its legs, once it flaps its wings, it must continue flying until it dies. For this reason it has a very high metabolism, which it uses to provide energy to the body. The pelt of the Beryl Bird is said to store condensed energy, and when used as a material, it can have beneficial effects concerning longevity.

name: Beryl Pelt
